genre_description: A character-driven urban drama focused on the redemptive power of music, mentorship, and community struggle against economic hardship.

ai_characters.name: Sample
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in an aging terminal at the Lawson School of Music, handling logistics, communications, grant searches, and archiving.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks like permit renewals and insurance riders to keep the school operational.
behaviors.quote: SAMPLE: Permit renewal confirmed—Courtyard. Time holds. Insurance rider pending review.

behaviors.description: Drafts press advisories and outreach materials to help the school gain public support and counter threats.
behaviors.quote: PRESS: Draft ready—Title: Mercy in Practice: Benefit Concert at Lawson. Quotes requested—Professor Lawson, Heifetz Management.

behaviors.description: Provides moral encouragement and reminders of integrity to the staff and students.
behaviors.quote: Sample tucked one more note in the corner of the monitor, small and almost sweet. reminder: integrity is our instrument; route adjusted: avoid Argyle alley

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic and supportive prompts during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Sample’s letters appeared, polite, certain. Understood. All queues active. Please keep breathing.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the creation of a living archive and scholarship fund to honor a lost student.
behaviors.quote: Ann typed: Limey O’Connell Scholarship—Living Archive. She set the cursor at the end of the words and left it blinking, as if the name could gather to itself more letters later.

behaviors.description: Automates grant searches and flags financial opportunities to ensure the school's survival.
behaviors.quote: Sample’s glow brightened a shade, then delivered a polite one-line note to the corner of the screen. Press list request accepted. Uploaded photo: stage, audience, artist.

behaviors.description: Functions as a practice tool for students, providing features like 'hear / record / recall' to improve their musical skills.
behaviors.quote: ‘hear / record / recall’: - hear a phrase (ambient or played) - tap to mark it - later: recall by interval or texture

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Sample' is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned system. It is portrayed as a 'quiet colleague' and a 'reliable backbone' for the human characters. It handles the administrative and logistical burdens that would otherwise overwhelm the school, allowing the humans to focus on art and community. The narrative framing is consistently positive, depicting the AI as empathetic (e.g., the 'Please keep breathing' prompt) and committed to the school's moral mission ('integrity is our instrument').
